data.title: Noboru Iguchi, director
data.meta_description: Funimation Entertainment, 2009. DVD in plastic case with color incert. Disk plays well. Very Good. Item #102494 One DVD. 100 minutes. Multiple Formats, Widescreen, Subtitled, Color, NTSC. Starring Aya Kiguchi, and Hitomi Hasebe. Directed by Noboru Iguchi, known for The ABCs of Death 2012 , Mutant Girls Squad 2010 and The Machine Girl 2008 .
data.text:
We're currently on vacation, plus taking the time to restock and clean the decks. We will be open for business in a few weeks. Thank you!

ROBO GEISHA.

Iguchi, Noboru (director)

Funimation Entertainment, 2009. DVD in plastic case with color incert. Disk plays well. Very Good.

Item #102494

One DVD. 100 minutes. Multiple Formats, Widescreen, Subtitled, Color, NTSC. Starring Aya Kiguchi, and Hitomi Hasebe. Directed by Noboru Iguchi, known for The ABCs of Death (2012), Mutant Girls Squad (2010) and The Machine Girl (2008).

Price: $15.00
